word: I am very glad to hear that you have been led to understand for yourself the condition of the unworked cities. . . . If this work had been undertaken years ago, large numbers would have been brought to a knowledge of the truth. . . . I am intensely in earnest, and Oh, I beg of you to encourage our people to redeem the time.--Letter 84, 1910, pp. 1, 2. (To Elder A. G. Daniells, July 26, 1910.)
